name: trawler maintenance, steel | trawler maintenance, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18256/documentation

This dataset represents the maintenance of steel trawlers, per 1000 kg of light ship weight, based on data from Peru (2004-3013), corresponding to 9 vessels (from a fleet of 54) for which data was avilable with different levels of detail. Specific data for specific inventory items may be based on sub-samples for which detailed data was available. Vessel dimensions: 34 - 275 m3 (16 - 34 m length).;System boundaries and relation between activities

Maintenance of vessels, including provision of all materials and work

End of life of replaced materials. Batteries are excluded, as they do not exist in the database
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from Peru, extrapolated to global (GLO)
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Peru features various shipyards and relevant ship-building and ship-retrofitting expertise.

exchanges.description: Maintenance of a steel trawler, per 1000 kg of light ship weight (LSW) over its lifetime. Regressions based on mainly primary data were created to relate the weight of each inventory item to a purse seiner's LSW,  adjusted for trawler's gear. The list of inventory items (granularity) contribute >95% of environmental impacts, as described in the reference publication.
